definition: country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
young fellow countryman/young person from the same village

sentences.english: This is how folks in my hometown see the world.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我们家乡人的体验。

sentences.english: The boss is plain from the area, also acquiesced in their home folder meat sister.
sentences.chinese: 老板是朴实的乡人，也就默许了妹妹夹他们家的肉吃。

sentences.english: Up the love spring very much.
sentences.chinese: 家乡人都非常的爱春天。

sentences.english: Would you tell us the differences between people here and in your hometown?
sentences.chinese: 你能跟我们讲讲这里人和你家乡人的差别吗？

sentences.english: The noise of dogs made me a stranger here.
sentences.chinese: 狗吠声让我变成异乡人，让我止步难前。

sentences.english: Clearly he has to play to his hometown crowd.
sentences.chinese: 很明显他只是向他的家乡人做秀。

sentences.english: There are many things that as a stranger initially threw me for a loop.
sentences.chinese: 最初，有很多事让我这个初来乍到的异乡人眩晕。

sentences.english: He is a stranger in New York.
sentences.chinese: 在纽约他是一个异乡人。

sentences.english: The stranger paused a moment in revery before this tender and calming spectacle.
sentences.chinese: 这个异乡人在那种温柔宁静的景物前出了一会神。

sentences.english: When Americans discover that you are a stranger.
sentences.chinese: 当美国人发现你是一位异乡人的时候。

sentences.english: Can become the dragon countryman I to feel extremely proud.
sentences.chinese: 能成为龙乡人我感到非常自豪。

sentences.english: East of the river, strangers from across the seas were seen less seldom.
sentences.chinese: 而在河东岸，狭海对面的异乡人则少见的多。

sentences.english: And you are not a pining outcast amongst strangers?
sentences.chinese: 你没有憔悴不堪，流落在异乡人中间吗？

sentences.english: Home when the rains can also be said countryman special day.
sentences.chinese: 故乡下雨的时候也可以说是乡人特别的日子。

sentences.english: Who dressed you, love, as a foreigner?
sentences.chinese: 是谁把你，我的情人，装扮成一个异乡人？

another part of the country/some other place
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
